title: Breakfast with Kay Burley
overview: Sky News Breakfast starts earlier—and has a fresh new look.Live from 6am every weekday, presenter Gareth Barlow is accompanied by Political Correspondent Mhari Aurora with news from around the world—and around Westminster.Barlow and Aurora stay in studio for Breakfast with Kay Burley from 7am – 10am, when Chief Presenter Kay conducts the morning's biggest interviews.Also joining Sky News Breakfast will be Wilfred Frost with previews of the day's news agenda live from the main newsroom.
